blurb: You want to wake up in the morning and think the future is going to be great - and that’s what being a spacefaring civilization is all about. It’s about believing in the future and thinking that the future will be better than the past. And I can’t think of anything more exciting than going out there and being among the stars

Can't believe someone would fake a bomb threat at Northeastern! I mean, seriously! The costs totally outweight the benefits, and any recognition from being the 'guy who reported the bomb' will quickly be replaced with recognition for being the 'guy who made a bomb threat'. Ridiculous!
